TopicTitle: What is the game that you are the exited the most?

Articles.Content:
What is the game that you are the exited the most?

for me is GTA V or X Rebirth.

Whats yours?

GTA V for sure.

Watch_Dogs, AC4, etc can wait, it's GTA coming!

Whoever played San Andreas knows this game will be good and not horrible like GTA IV.

Yesterday night I was watching some streams of guys who pirated it when it leaked (no, I don't support piracy at all) and I was drooling all the time (I started somewhere before midnight and when I looked at the clock it was 0:40 lol).
The Walking Dead Season 2...... I'll wait...
GTAV. If you don't see me after Tuesday... You'll know why.

GTA V, when it finally comes up for the REAL GAMING PLATFORMS *COUGH* PC *COUGH*.

I have no consoles. So no GTA V.

Am I the only one who looks at GTA V and says: Meh?

KSP 0.22
Minecraft 1.7 i think
TOW:Rome II and the new command and conquer online game.
GTAV? Meh. METAL GEAR SOLID V! YAY!

What is the game that you are the exited the most?

for me is GTA V or X Rebirth.

Whats yours?

Ooh, I forgot X Rebirth is out soon. Definitely that.
Prison Architect... and 0.22
Grand Theft Auto V, Prison Architect, and .22.

Tough call. I've been watching Kinetic Void, trying to decide when I want to jump into that. I've been on a very long search for a more modular space combat and trading game, and that one might just be the ticket in the end.

I think Arma 3 is taking the cake right now, even though the game actually is out. My problem is that right now I am waiting on a better internet connection, so I wont be playing for at least a couple weeks when I should be able to handle multiplayer. Also, my computer is aging, and I am waiting on a new GPU for christmas, probably an HD 7870 or 7950. I don't mind the wait though, I am hoping to grab that one on sale.

I think there is also a Mount and Blade 2 on the very distant horizon.
.22 for ksp

GTA V IS RELEASED!!!

Go get it now!!!!!

The crew anyone?

But GTA V looks absolutely amazing
GTA V.Getting PS4/3 just for that.
Ksp 22. And minecraft 1.7

KSP 0.22

I've almost quit playing due to intense anticipation...

I'm looking forward to Monster Hunter on the PC if it ever comes out, Mario Kart for the Wii-U, (i'l have to buy a Wii-U when it's released,) Elite-Dangerous and of course anything Kerbal related, Rome 2 was on that list but i'm not playing it much at the moment, and i haven't got any console that can play the new GTA so i'l have to miss out on that for now.

Eh, totally uninterested to GTA.

I'm looking forward to Pokemon X/Y a lot Also Halo 5 next year as well as Zelda: A Link Between Worlds. And of course looking forward to every update of KSP that is to come.

It's interesting you say that about GTA Chris, i sort of feel the same, San Andreas was the most fun one for me, i know some people said it was too ridiculous because it had so many wacky things the community wanted, but i thought it was great, it even had some light rpg stuff thrown in there, GTA4 though was a minimalist "i'l tell you how the story goes, what you do and when you do it" kind of affair, as if Rockstar thought in San Andreas they had listened to the community too much.

Despite having the most astounding city i've ever seen in a GTA game (every last leaf looked hand-crafted) it had no countryside and no plethora of crazy things to do on the side as San Andreas did, since then i've grown tired of the GTA formula, a short story that is finished in eight hours followed by hundreds of hours driving around aimlessly collecting stuff or trying to find stunt ramps just gets old, and it's not the only series this has happened to me in, i think there's only so many sequels i can take where very little changes.

Meh, it's just not my type of game. Really running around and killing people, stealing cars, and all the other stuff you do in there just isn't fun to me. The game does look great, but I'm not getting anny fun outta it, so :l
Personally I'm really looking forward to The Elder Scrolls Online. I've played all of the games through several times, and from the looks of things it seems they may have nailed it as an MMO.

KSP 0.22 and Minecraft 1.7 (I can't wait more)

Edited October 6, 2013 by Dart980
